Class ScaleType

Namespace
NDSH.Geospatial.Gml.Measures
Assembly
NDSH.Geospatial.Metadata.ISO19115.Ed2003.dll

Represents the GML ScaleType from the GML specification. This class extends MeasureType to handle scale or ratio measurements, typically dimensionless values with an optional unit of measure.

[JsonObject("ScaleType")]
public class ScaleType : MeasureType, IModel, IObservableModel, INotifyPropertyChanged, IDbId, IComparable<MeasureType>, IEquatable<MeasureType>

Remarks

Defined in /2005/gml/measures.xsd, ScaleType inherits the properties of MeasureType, storing a numeric Value and its corresponding UnitOfMeasure uom. In many geospatial contexts, scale is dimensionless or expressed as a ratio (e.g., “1:50,000”), but if necessary, a unit of measure can be provided to support domain-specific needs.

Use this class to ensure your model complies with GML requirements for scale-related metadata, enabling standardized exchange of geospatial data involving scale factors or ratios.
